physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a concert hall in the Botanical Gardens in Batavia (Jakarta)
 Indonesia. The concert hall has decorated roofs and shuttered windows. The building has a small porch on the left. The edges of the photographs are curved. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photographs.
